entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain or drizzle after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
